sentences.sContent: He has taken care of the girl who wanted to snitch.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has taken care of the girl who wanted to snitch.
sentences.sCn: 他已经干掉要告密的女孩了。

remMethod.val: sni(看作sin， 罪行)+tch → 告密和偷都是罪行 → 告密； 偷

words.tran: 管道涂层裂缝检测仪；告密者；小偷

trans.tranOther: to tell someone in authority about something that another person has done wrong, because you want to cause trouble for that person
